title: Handle a Vessel Schedule Change
description: An agent reports their vessel is delayed by 12 hours due to bad weather. The scheduler must adjust the berth plan.

tasks.description: Receive the updated ETA for the delayed vessel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Scheduler logs the new ETA, which is 12 hours later than planned.

tasks.description: Check if the vessel's currently assigned berth is still available at the new ETA.
tasks.expected_outcome: Scheduler finds the original berth is now occupied by another vessel at the new time.

tasks.description: Find a new available berth or reschedule the conflicting vessel, then update and re-confirm the plan with all parties.
tasks.expected_outcome: Scheduler finds a different available berth, reallocates the vessel, re-books services, and sends an updated confirmation.
